snippet: The Sundance Institute has named Summer Shelton, who has been credited on several films, including “Goodbye Solo,” as its first Bingham Ray Creative Producing Fellow.
abstract: Sundance Institute names Summer Shelton, who has been credited on several independent films, as its first Bingham Ray Creative Producing Fellow.
lead_paragraph: The Sundance Institute has named Summer Shelton, who has been credited on several films, including “Goodbye Solo,” as its first Bingham Ray Creative Producing Fellow.
